analyzed: dāṭhā vudhaḥ ghora visa usi sappa

original: So maṁ akkami taṁ kupito aḍaṁsiṁ,
Uṇho ca vāto tikhiṇā ca rasmiyo,
analyzed: uṇhaḥ ca vātaḥ tikhiṇā ca rasmiyaḥ

original: Kiso ca paṇḍū ca ahaṁ bhadante,

analyzed: saḥ mama avedī gatim āgatim ca
na ca api nam māna gatena pucchi
mānaḥ mamam mā punar āgamāsi iti
